description: Retrieves a list of tradable currency pairs at a specific connection.

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "EXCHANGE", "CUSTODY", "OTC", or "BANK" -- relevant to the current operation.

description: Gets market price data pertinent to a specific connection and a currency pair.

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: currency_pair
queryParameters.description: Specifies the currency pair relevant to the current operation, formatted as "BaseCurrency/QuoteCurrency" (e.g., "BTC/BRL").

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "EXCHANGE", "CUSTODY", "OTC", or "BANK" -- relevant to the current operation.

description: Creates an order at a specific connection.

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "EXCHANGE", "CUSTODY", "OTC", or "BANK" -- relevant to the current operation.

fields.name: connection_id
fields.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

description: Cancels an existing order using the order ID. For certain counterparties, the currency pair must be provided for this operation.

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

pathParameters.name: id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the identifier of the specific order.

queryParameters.name: currency_pair
queryParameters.description: Specifies the currency pair relevant to the current operation, formatted as "BaseCurrency/QuoteCurrency" (e.g., "BTC/BRL").

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "EXCHANGE", "CUSTODY", "OTC", or "BANK" -- relevant to the current operation.

description: Retrieves specific details of an existing order using the order ID. For certain counterparties, the currency pair must be provided for this operation.

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

pathParameters.name: id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the identifier of the specific order.

queryParameters.name: currency_pair
queryParameters.description: Specifies the currency pair relevant to the current operation, formatted as "BaseCurrency/QuoteCurrency" (e.g., "BTC/BRL").

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "EXCHANGE", "CUSTODY", "OTC", or "BANK" -- relevant to the current operation.

description: Retrieves a list of open orders at a specific connection, offering the option to filter by the currency pair.

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "EXCHANGE", "CUSTODY", "OTC", or "BANK" -- relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: currency_pair
queryParameters.description: Specifies the currency pair relevant to the current operation, formatted as "BaseCurrency/QuoteCurrency" (e.g., "BTC/BRL").

description: Creates an quote at a specific connection.

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

fields.name: connection_id
fields.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

description: Retrieves a list of executed trades at a specific connection, providing the flexibility to filter the results based on the order ID, start date, and currency pair.

pathParameters.name: connection_id
pathParameters.description: This path parameter, a string in UUID format, serves to identify the specific connection relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: counterparty_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of a particular connection -- "EXCHANGE", "CUSTODY", "OTC", or "BANK" -- relevant to the current operation.

queryParameters.name: order_id
queryParameters.description: Specifies the identifier of the order that originated one or more trades.

queryParameters.name: currency_pair
queryParameters.description: Specifies the currency pair relevant to the current operation, formatted as "BaseCurrency/QuoteCurrency" (e.g., "BTC/BRL").
